description_data.value: ** RESERVED ** This candidate has been reserved by an organization or individual that will use it when announcing a new security problem. When the candidate has been publicized, the details for this candidate will be provided.

descriptions.value: The AES key utilized in the pairing process between a lock using Sciener firmware and a wireless keypad is not unique, and can be reused to compromise other locks using the Sciener firmware.

La clave AES utilizada en el proceso de emparejamiento entre una cerradura que usa el firmware Sciener y un teclado inalámbrico no es única y puede reutilizarse para comprometer otras cerraduras que usan el firmware Sciener.
